org.mongojack

Class MongoDBTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mongojack.MongoDBTestBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestCustomObjectMapper, TestDBCursor, TestDBQuery, TestDBRefHandling, TestDBUpdate, TestDBUpdateSerialization, TestIdAnnotatedClass, TestJacksonDBCollection, TestJsonViews, TestMapReduce, TestObjectIdHandling, TestParsingAndGenerating, TestWriteResult

    public abstract class MongoDBTestBase
extends Object
    Base class for unit tests that run against MongoDB. Assumes there is a MongoDB instance listening on the default port on localhost, and that we can do whatever we want to a database called "unittest".
